sentences.english: End up with custom scenery photography gives me inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 最后得到的风俗风物摄影带给我的启示。

sentences.english: And there are also a multitude of sceneries and stories related to Jigong.
sentences.chinese: 与济公相关的民俗风物传说也十分丰富。

sentences.english: The image of folk sights is the result that the author recounts and narrates in the…
sentences.chinese: 小说中民俗风物的意象化是作者叙事建构的结果。

sentences.english: I want a double room with a view.
sentences.chinese: 我要一间能看到风物的双人房间。

sentences.english: Irving was another American author for whom the native legend and landscape were sources of inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 欧文属于那类从本土传说和风物中获取灵感的作家。

sentences.english: His poems cover almost all the scenery with hills and waters of Huzhou.
sentences.chinese: 他几乎写遍了湖州的山山水水和风物风貌。

definition: water from a mountain/mountains and rivers/scenery/landscape
natural conditions and social customs of a place/local conditions
poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry
a place famous for its scenery or historical relics/scenic spot/CL:處|处[chu4]
anecdote/lost or apocryphal story about famous person
